messages.title: A BETTER PLAN. A BETTER FUTURE.
messages.content: Labour's plan includes a strong economic foundation, higher living standards for working families, an NHS with the time to care, controls on immigration, and a country where the next generation can do better than the last.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Balance the books and cut the deficit every year while securing the future of the NHS.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: HIGHER LIVING STANDARDS FOR WORKING FAMILIES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Freeze energy bills until 2017 and give power to regulator to cut bills. Ban exploitative zero-hours contracts, raise the minimum wage to £8, and provide 25 hours free childcare.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: AN NHS WITH THE TIME TO CARE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Build an NHS with time to care: 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs. Join up services from home to hospital, guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours and cancer tests within one week.
People who come to UK won't be able to claim benefits for at least two years, introduce fair rules making it illegal for employers to undercut wages by exploiting workers.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A COUNTRY WHERE THE NEXT GENERATION CAN DO BETTER THAN THE LAST
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reduce tuition fees to £6,000, guarantee an apprenticeship for every school leaver, and ensure smaller class sizes for 5, 6, and 7-year-olds.

mentions.candidate: I'm a small business owner. I taught at Harrow College and I'm standing up for the residents of Harrow East - Uma Kumaran

issues.economy: We will balance the books and cut the deficit every year.
issues.education: Reduce tuition fees to £6,000, guarantee an apprenticeship for every school leaver, and ensure smaller class sizes.
issues.health: We will build an NHS with the time to care: 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more GPs. Join up services from home to hospital.
issues.immigration: People who come here won't be able to claim benefits for at least two years, will introduce fair rules to prevent wage undercut by employers.

images.caption: Images of local people and Uma Kumaran with pledges
